Gotta love good old fashioned counter strike
its counter-strike. you got a better reason?

Really good game at the time that I bought it, but now the community have just been overflooded by little kids and it is unbearable to play a game of Counter Strike Source, without a squaker yelling in the background. CS:S is also outdated and it's newer brother (Counter Strike Global Offensive) is much better at the job and there aren't that many smaller squaker children on there yet and hopefully not for a longer period of time. but this review is not about Counter Strike Global Offensive and how great it is, this is about Counter-Strike: Source, It have all of the original maps such as de_Dust, de_Dust II, de_nuke, and ofcause cs_Office, that you need to have if you want to play Garry's mod, so even though I don't play it anymore I am still glad I have it installed, for my times when I play Garry's mod. I have had a lot of great hours in CS:S but I am sad to say this is the end. Great game but too many children playing so it isn't that enjoyable anymore.
Counter Strike Source was the best game i had played! :)

CS:S is a great, PC FPS. I really recommend this game if you love FPS's, but Global Offensive is just a bit better then Source. I would go with GO, but if you already have that then you should get this. Also, this game is nearly essencial for Garry's Mod, because Gmod uses a lot of these textures and if you don't have this game there's a high chance you will see pink and black lines in multiplayer games.

8/10
